title: Bill Proposal: Re-evaluation of Fear of Loss Inhibition AXIOM

reasoning.problem: I propose a Bill to re-evaluate the "Fear of Loss Inhibition" AXIOM in light of the increased focus on ethical decision-making. This AXIOM currently permits aggressive risk-taking during market crashes, which may conflict with the principles outlined in the newly acquired ethics PDFs (Constitutional AI and Aristotle's Nicomachean Ethics). The Bill should establish a framework for balancing rapid liquidity response with ethical considerations and long-term sustainability. I suggest that the Auditor and AttorneyGeneral collaborate on drafting specific amendments to the AXIOM.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
